page.title: 17WAR EMERGENCY COMMITTEE-1985
page.content: The War Emergency Committee is a sub committee of the Parish Council.It is responsible through the District Council to the County Council for the survival,recovery and maintenance of community life in the parish after an attack by nuclear weapons.Decreed by the Government it is obligatory that County Councils prepare{Home Defence plans and the organisation to put these plans into effect in wartime. The aim of the committee is to help the community survive and continue.Any nuclear attack,with radio active fall-out would result in enormous damage and casualties.It is possible that the survival rate could be as high as 80% in some rural areas,such as ours.
